user.name: Abdullah Basharat
user.bio: I CAN get things done - whether it is something that I have experience in or something that I have to research or reverse-engineer to learn. Problem Solver.

node.name: Predict-Human-State-with-Kafka
node.description: This project delves into predicting human states through smartphone sensor data(Accelerometer and Gyroscope), employing machine learning models, and showcasing results via Flask. It provides a practical exploration of Big Data Analytics, emphasizing collaborative efforts.

node.name: HotelManagementSystem
node.description: OOP project in C++ for Hotel Management. Implements reservation, check-in, and utilizes encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism for efficient organization and management.

node.name: Fitness-app-for-diabetes-patients
node.description: Mobile App that uses machine learning models in python to detects position of user, counts number of steps taken each day, records level of blood-glucose level and calories intake. Finally, stores all this data in Google's Firestore.

node.name: Home-Automation-system-using-Machine-Learning
node.description: It is a home automation based ML model which works just like 'SIRI'. It is names as 'RUHA'.
